verses.verse: The word<WH1697> that<WH834> Jeremiah<WH3414> the prophet<WH5030> spoke<WH1696> unto<WH413> Baruch<WH1263> the son<WH1121> of Neriah,<WH5374> when he had written<WH3789> <WH853> these<WH428> words<WH1697> in<WH5921> a book<WH5612> at the mouth<WH4480> <WH6310> of Jeremiah,<WH3414> in the fourth<WH7243> year<WH8141> of Jehoiakim<WH3079> the son<WH1121> of Josiah<WH2977> king<WH4428> of Judah,<WH3063> saying,<WH559>
Thus <WH3541> saith<WH559> the LORD,<WH3068> the God<WH430> of Israel,<WH3478> unto<WH5921> thee, O Baruch;<WH1263>

Thou didst say,<WH559> Woe<WH188> is me now!<WH4994> for<WH3588> the LORD<WH3068> hath added<WH3254> grief<WH3015> to<WH5921> my sorrow;<WH4341> I fainted<WH3021> in my sighing,<WH585> and I find<WH4672> no<WH3808> rest.<WH4496>

Thus <WH3541> shalt thou say<WH559> unto<WH413> him, The LORD<WH3068> saith<WH559> thus;<WH3541> Behold,<WH2009> that which<WH834> I have built<WH1129> will I<WH589> break down,<WH2040> and that which<WH834> I have planted<WH5193> I<WH589> will pluck up,<WH5428> even this<WH1931> whole<WH3605> land.<WH776>

And seekest<WH1245> thou<WH859> great things<WH1419> for thyself? seek<WH1245> them not:<WH408> for,<WH3588> behold,<WH2009> I will bring<WH935> evil<WH7451> upon<WH5921> all<WH3605> flesh,<WH1320> saith<WH5002> the LORD:<WH3068> but<WH853> thy life<WH5315> will I give<WH5414> unto thee for a prey<WH7998> in<WH5921> all<WH3605> places<WH4725> whither<WH834> <WH8033> thou goest.<WH1980>
